name: Commentator
body:
### Commentator.

This is a code and comment analysis script that is designed to encourage 
developers to more thoroughly comment code. 

Right now it's fairly simple.  It accepts Javascript / CoffeeScript files as
input, but eventually should be file type agnostic (comment styles will just need to be defined)

To call the script, call enforce.py and pass in a file name (either relative
path or absolute).  e.g.

```
$ python enforce.py test.js
```
tagline: Comment analysis program that analyzes code to encourage developers to comment more
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
